tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"heading"},{"id":"1647213","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

My jam sessions tend to always lead me to deep drones and ambient atmospheres, and its becoming a confort zone, so I've been trying to runaway from this place and explore other sonic realms.

Everything was recorded directly from the rack to an Zoom H6, one stereo track for the drums, other stereo track for the rest of the instruments. Edited the drums track in Live, attenuate the hihats a bit and compressed all the mix slightly.

There's a crossfade on the video, otherwise it would be repetive and boring to watch. Still so much to learn :)<\/p>","pa_condition_repeater":[{"_id":"089e335","pa_condition_date":"2022\/08\/20","pa_condition_date_range":"2022\/08\/20"}],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"2e85535","elType":"widget","settings":{"youtube_url":"https:\/\/youtu.be\/O8iSSWh3rss","vimeo_url":"https:\/\/vimeo.com\/235215203","dailymotion_url":"https:\/\/www.dailymotion.com\/video\/x6tqhqb","pa_condition_repeater":[{"_id":"fbea8c2","pa_condition_date":"2022\/08\/20","pa_condition_date_range":"2022\/08\/20"}],"videopress_url":"https:\/\/videopress.com\/v\/ZCAOzTNk","premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"video"}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]

item.title: Modular Jam #3 Dragon Flyer
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Modular Jam #3 Dragon Flyer

Video recorded in Serra da Arrábida, Portugal

Sound recorded live using a modular eurorack system

Video gear used in this video:
Sony A6400
Sony 90mm Macro lens

Audio gear used in this video:
Mutable Instruments Veils
Mutable Instruments Rings
1010 Music BitboxMicro
Buchla & Tiptop Audio 281t
Strymon Magneto
Noise Engineering Desmodus Versio
Happy Nerding FX Aid XL
Endorphines Milky Way
Befaco STMix
Arturia Keystep Pro
Zoom H6

https://youtu.be/kQIKLBSn8C0

item.title: Modular Jam #4 Cosmik Riders
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Modular Jam #4 Cosmik Riders

Recorded live with a modular system

Edited the mix in Ableton Live, mainly some minor EQ and compressed the mix a bit.
Edited the video in Adobe Premiere to make a proper intro and development.
—————— Modular Recipe: KSP random arpeggio to MI Rings straight to Befaco STMix The same CV that goes to Rings is being compared with ADDAC208 and triggering an Envelope. This envelope opens another VCA channel with a copy of Rings output, connected to Desmodus Versio
Rings Structure is being modulated by PNW attenuated Square wave, connected to ADDAC215 Dual S&H in Track&Hold mode with Slew fully dialed in
Previously recorded Rings output to Morphagene A random trigger opens the Morphagene VCA, it's connected to Strymon Magneto A slow clock is switching Magneto play mode forward/reverse
KSP is triggering drums samples 1010Music Bitbox Micro, with samples from Ableton Live. Randomly triggering hihats that are stereo panned by Endorphines Milky Way Snare has a slight reverd from FX Aid Bass by Tiptop Buchla 258t and 281t
Adittional textures with Plaits going thru a Reverb algorythm by Expert Sleepers Disting EX
Everything recorded on Zoom H6
—————— Video gear: Sony a6400 7artisans Fish-eye 7.5mm
—————— Video cover by: https://unsplash.com/photos/oMpAz-DN-9I https://youtu.be/BYS_S-TNkyc

item.title: Modular Jam #5 Temple Tsunami // Disco Diffusion
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Modular Jam #5 Temple Tsunami // Disco Diffusion

Temple Tsunami
I started to play with Disco Diffusion a couple of days ago, and I really got overwhelmed by its simplicity and power.
This video is composed by a set of short animations, with simple prompts like “Temple sitting on an ocean with a huge tidal wave” or “sitting in the clouds with the form of a tsunami”.
The animations were mixed in After Effects and sent to FlowFrame.https://nmkd.itch.io/flowframesBrought everything back to After Effects, re-arranged the composition and stretched everything about 300% and applied Frame Blending with Optical Flow.This workflow is just an experiment, and not a final recipe. My exploration continues.
The sound was recorded live using a modular system.https://youtu.be/h59BBGR0Fg4

item.title: Modular Jam #7 Car in the desert
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Modular Jam #7 Car in the desert

As ferramentas AI tornaram-se muito gratificantes e imediatas, e na maioria das vezes os resultados são supreendentes. Existem tantos parâmetros e detalhes técnicos para explorar que tornam estes processos em viagens intermináveis. Obtive estas três imagens e pensei que poderia ser um exercício interessante fazer uma foto-montagem, e aproveitar para sacudir a ferrugem das skills de photoshop. A imagem final está longe da perfeição, mas adorei o processo. A música é gravada ao vivo por mim. -- It's very gratifying the way AI tools work and interacts with you, and most of the time returns always great results. There are so many parameters and technical details to explore that make this an endless journey. I came out with these three images and thought it would be a great opportunity to remove the rust out of my photoshop skills. It's far away from being a perfect image, but it was a great exercise. The music was recorded by me performing live. https://youtu.be/l1twlYPZrmw

It's very gratifying the way AI tools work and interacts with you, and most of the time returns always great results. There are so many parameters and technical details to explore that make this an endless journey.<\/p>

I came out with these three images and thought it would be a great opportunity to remove the rust out of my photoshop skills. It's far away from being a perfect image, but it was a great exercise.<\/p>

The music was recorded by me performing live.<\/p>","pa_condition_repeater":[{"_id":"089e335","pa_condition_key":"browser","pa_condition_valtime_range":"","pa_condition_operator":"is","pa_condition_browser":"chrome","pa_condition_device":"desktop","pa_condition_day":["sunday"],"pa_condition_date":"2022\/08\/20","pa_condition_date_range":"2022\/08\/20","pa_condition_time_range":"","pa_condition_ip_location":[],"pa_condition_lang":[],"pa_condition_login_status":"logged","pa_condition_return_visitor":"return","pa_condition_post":[],"pa_condition_post_type":[],"pa_condition_page":[],"pa_condition_static_page":"home","pa_condition_operating_system":["windows"],"pa_condition_user_role":[],"pa_condition_timezone":"server"}]},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"2e85535","elType":"widget","settings":{"youtube_url":"https:\/\/youtu.be\/l1twlYPZrmw","vimeo_url":"https:\/\/vimeo.com\/235215203","dailymotion_url":"https:\/\/www.dailymotion.com\/video\/x6tqhqb","pa_condition_repeater":[{"_id":"fbea8c2","pa_condition_key":"browser","pa_condition_valtime_range":"","pa_condition_operator":"is","pa_condition_browser":"chrome","pa_condition_device":"desktop","pa_condition_day":["sunday"],"pa_condition_date":"2022\/08\/20","pa_condition_date_range":"2022\/08\/20","pa_condition_time_range":"","pa_condition_ip_location":[],"pa_condition_lang":[],"pa_condition_login_status":"logged","pa_condition_return_visitor":"return","pa_condition_post":[],"pa_condition_post_type":[],"pa_condition_page":[],"pa_condition_static_page":"home","pa_condition_operating_system":["windows"],"pa_condition_user_role":[],"pa_condition_timezone":"server"}]},"elements":[],"widgetType":"video"}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]

item.title: Modular Jam #8 Endless Stream
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Modular Jam #8 Endless Stream

Tenho vindo a trabalhar nesta animação já lá vai umas semanas, desde que descobri o Stable Diffusion. O que mais gosto neste algoritmo é que corre no collab, e por requerer tão poucos recursos computacionais é possível usar o collab quase ininterruptamente com a versão Pro. Esta animação é uma mistura de prompts e estilos, gosto especialmente de ver a evolução do estilo à medida que a animação avança. Isto deve-se a estar a aprender e a habituar-me às nuances do Deforum, especialmente a possibilidade de interpolação de prompts.
A música é gravada ao vivo.

I’ve been working on this animation since I discovered SD, and later, the Deforum version. What is great is that it runs on collab and because it is low on computational resources, it runs almost endless on collab with the Pro version. This animation is a mix of prompts and styles, and I like to see how the style evolves throughout the animation as I get used to Deforum features, specially the prompt interpolation, for me is a game changer.
The music is recorded live.

https://youtu.be/8qnNouKIdOY

item.title: Dreambox
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Dreambox

Para ler este artigo em Português clica aqui.

Dreambox is an installation that takes me to a mental corner, where dreams, ideas, and memories reside. These mental entities have a life of their own, they can be more or less active, pulsate in synchrony or asynchrony, they can fall asleep completely leaving only one active, or even none.

This installation began with the need to decorate one of the spaces in the "Circular Corner" (Canto Circular) at Largo de Residências. The "Circular Corner" includes the "Community Cabinet" (Armário Comunitário) where you can exchange objects, and the "Community Cabinet" where you can exchange clothes, and this is where Dreambox is located.

https://youtu.be/OQMw_LAYRII

Having identified the location to intervene, I found these plastic boxes on Blab, and immediately saw their graphic and aesthetic potential.
After some tests with the lights, it was decided that this was the way to go.

I wanted to place the boxes on the wall in a non-obvious and somewhat deconstructed way, as if the boxes had been falling over time. I did a series of tests in Photoshop until I found a pattern that I liked.

https://guilhermemartins.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/mockups.mov

Regarding the lighting, it consists of leftovers from Neon LED strips.

The control box with all the electronics made with PVC.

https://guilhermemartins.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/night_studies2_opt.mp4

For each light, I'm using a Mosfet. These Mosfets have an LED on the board, which allowed me to simulate all the light behaviors at the lab.

As I wanted the lights to have various behaviors, I decided to use a motion sensor (PIR), and as a redundancy, I added a microwave sensor that detects changes in electromagnetic fields. With these detections, the different states alternate.

Different states/behaviors of the lights:

https://guilhermemartins.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/heartbeat_h264.mp4

Heartbeat:

All lights pulsate in unison, referring to the various ideas/dreams/memories that pulsate simultaneously in our minds, whether it's due to multitasking, being unfocused, having multiple concerns, or simply being multi-dreamers.

https://guilhermemartins.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/randomfades_h264.mp4

Random Fade In/Out:

Similar to Heartbeat, but asynchronous. Disparate ideas/dreams/memories competing for attention. An unfocused mind or excessive mental activity.

https://guilhermemartins.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/unique_h264.mp4

Individual Activity:

A single active light, as if our mental focus were acute, with active consciousness and a mind filled with a single thought. Mindfulness, Nirvana.

This was my first solo installation after more than a decade of developing commercial projects for clients.

I would like to give a special thanks to Sónia Sousa (@Lady.Maker) for the invitation and challenge to participate in the "Canto Circular" and for believing in me to carry out this project. To the crew of Blab Colectivo Maker (@blablapt) for all the help and availability. And to Largo de Residências (@largoresidencias) for supporting and encouraging these initiatives.

It is also an honor to be next to "Masya, é uma instalação" by @m41.m, and to see how these two works coexist and communicate so well with each other in the end.

For each light, I'm using a Mosfet<\/a>. With these detections, the different states alternate.<\/p>","pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"5ddb793","elType":"widget","settings":{"image":{"url":"https:\/\/guilhermemartins.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2023\/04\/sensor.jpg","id":3482,"size":"","alt":"","source":"library"},"image_size":"medium_large","pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"image"},{"id":"dac0063","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

Heartbeat:<\/p>

All lights pulsate in unison, referring to the various ideas\/dreams\/memories that pulsate simultaneously in our minds, whether it's due to multitasking, being unfocused, having multiple concerns, or simply being multi-dreamers.<\/p>","pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":true},{"id":"ddbceda","elType":"section","settings":{"structure":"20","pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[{"id":"9c83ed7","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":50,"_inline_size":null,"pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[{"id":"1ab19e7","elType":"widget","settings":{"video_type":"hosted","youtube_url":"https:\/\/www.youtube.com\/watch?v=XHOmBV4js_E","vimeo_url":"https:\/\/vimeo.com\/235215203","dailymotion_url":"https:\/\/www.dailymotion.com\/video\/x6tqhqb","hosted_url":{"url":"https:\/\/guilhermemartins.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2023\/04\/randomfades_h264.mp4","id":3520,"size":"","alt":"","source":"library"},"autoplay":"yes","play_on_mobile":"yes","loop":"yes","pa_condition_repeater":[],"videopress_url":"https:\/\/videopress.com\/v\/ZCAOzTNk","premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"video"}],"isInner":true},{"id":"a00e5b3","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":50,"_inline_size":null,"pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[{"id":"a8a1e95","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

Random Fade In\/Out:<\/p>

Similar to Heartbeat, but asynchronous. Disparate ideas\/dreams\/memories competing for attention. An unfocused mind or excessive mental activity.<\/p>","pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":true},{"id":"b5ab0e1","elType":"section","settings":{"structure":"20","pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[{"id":"6b6aed9","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":50,"_inline_size":null,"pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[{"id":"0f6fb8d","elType":"widget","settings":{"video_type":"hosted","youtube_url":"https:\/\/www.youtube.com\/watch?v=XHOmBV4js_E","vimeo_url":"https:\/\/vimeo.com\/235215203","dailymotion_url":"https:\/\/www.dailymotion.com\/video\/x6tqhqb","hosted_url":{"url":"https:\/\/guilhermemartins.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2023\/04\/unique_h264.mp4","id":3521,"size":"","alt":"","source":"library"},"autoplay":"yes","play_on_mobile":"yes","loop":"yes","pa_condition_repeater":[],"videopress_url":"https:\/\/videopress.com\/v\/ZCAOzTNk","premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"video"}],"isInner":true},{"id":"6f0bfff","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":50,"_inline_size":null,"pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[{"id":"8874323","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

Individual Activity:<\/p>

A single active light, as if our mental focus were acute, with active consciousness and a mind filled with a single thought. Mindfulness, Nirvana.<\/p>","pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":true},{"id":"3d27437","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

This was my first solo installation after more than a decade of developing commercial projects for clients.<\/p>

I would like to give a special thanks to S\u00f3nia Sousa (@Lady.Maker<\/a>) for the invitation and challenge to participate in the \"Canto Circular\" and for believing in me to carry out this project. To the crew of Blab Colectivo Maker (@blablapt<\/a>) for all the help and availability. And to Largo de Resid\u00eancias (@largoresidencias<\/a>) for supporting and encouraging these initiatives.<\/p>

It is also an honor to be next to \"Masya, \u00e9 uma instala\u00e7\u00e3o\" by @m41.m<\/a>, and to see how these two works coexist and communicate so well with each other in the end.<\/p>","pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"1992c42","elType":"widget","settings":{"image":{"url":"https:\/\/guilhermemartins.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2023\/04\/masya.jpeg","id":3490,"size":"","alt":"","source":"library"},"image_size":"medium_large","pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"image"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]

item.title: Dreambox_pt
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Dreambox

Read this post in English

Dreambox é uma instalação que me remete para um recanto mental, onde sonhos, ideias e memórias habitam. Estas entidades mentais têm uma actividade própria, podem estar mais ou menos activas, pulsam em sincronia ou em dessincronia, podem adormecer completamente ficando apenas uma activa, ou nem isso.

Esta instalação começou com a necessidade de intervir num dos espaços do “Canto Circular” no Largo de Residências. O “Canto Circular” engloba o “Armário Comunitário” onde se pode fazer troca de objectos, e o “Guarda-Roupa Comunitário” onde é possível trocar roupa, e é aqui que Dreambox se encontra.

https://youtu.be/OQMw_LAYRII

Identificado o local, encontrei estas caixas de plástico no Blab, e vi logo o seu potencial estético e gráfico.
Depois de alguns ensaios com as luzes decidiu-se que tinhamos bom material para trabalhar.

Queria colocar as caixas na parede de uma maneira não óbvia, e meio desconstruida, como se as caixas tivessem vindo a cair com o tempo.
Fiz uma série de ensaios em Photoshop até encontrar um padrão que me agradasse. 

https://guilhermemartins.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/mockups.mov

Os anéis de luz são sobras de tiras de Led Neon de outros projectos.

A caixa de controle com toda a electrónica feita em PVC.

https://guilhermemartins.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/night_studies2_opt.mp4

Para cada luz estou a usar um Mosfet, estes têm um Led na placa o que permitiu simular todo o comportamento das luzes no laboratório.

Como queria que as luzes tivessem vários comportamentos, decidi usar um sensor de movimento (PIR), e como redundância acrescentei um sensor de Micro Ondas que detecta alterações nos campos electromagnéticos. Com estas detecções os diferentes estados vão-se alternando.

Diferentes estados/comportamentos das luzes:

https://guilhermemartins.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/heartbeat_h264.mp4

Heartbeat:

Todas pulsam em uníssono, remetendo às várias ideias/sonhos/memórias que nos pulsam em simultâneo ora por estamos em multi-tasking, ora por estarmos desfocados, ou por ter várias preocupações, ou por sermos simplesmente multi-sonhadores.

https://guilhermemartins.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/randomfades_h264.mp4

Random Fade In/Out:

O mesmo do heartbeat mas assíncrono. Ideias/sonhos/memórias díspares, que competem por atenção. Mente desfocada ou actividade mental excessiva.

https://guilhermemartins.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/unique_h264.mp4

Actividade Individual

Uma única luz activa, como que se o nosso foco mental estivesse agudo, consciência activa, mente preenchida com um único pensamento. Mindfulness, Nirvana.

Esta foi a primeira instalação a solo, depois de mais de uma década a desenvolver projectos comerciais para clientes.

Deixo um especial agradecimento à Sónia Sousa (@Lady.Maker), pelo convite e desafio para participar no “Canto Circular”, e por ter acreditado e confiado em mim para a realização deste projecto. À crew do Blab Colectivo Maker (@blablapt) por toda a ajuda e disponibilidade. E ao Largo de Residências (@largoresidencias) por suportar e incentivar estas iniciativas.

É também uma honra estar ao lado de "masya,, é uma instalação" do @m41.m, e ver como no fim estas duas obras co-existem e comunicam tão bem entre elas.

Read this post in English<\/a><\/span><\/p>

Dreambox \u00e9 uma instala\u00e7\u00e3o que me remete para um recanto mental, onde sonhos, ideias e mem\u00f3rias habitam. Estas entidades mentais t\u00eam uma actividade pr\u00f3pria, podem estar mais ou menos activas, pulsam em sincronia ou em dessincronia, podem adormecer completamente ficando apenas uma activa, ou nem isso.

Esta instala\u00e7\u00e3o come\u00e7ou com a necessidade de intervir num dos espa\u00e7os do \u201cCanto Circular\u201d no Largo de Resid\u00eancias<\/a>. O \u201cCanto Circular\u201d engloba o \u201cArm\u00e1rio Comunit\u00e1rio\u201d onde se pode fazer troca de objectos, e o \u201cGuarda-Roupa Comunit\u00e1rio\u201d onde \u00e9 poss\u00edvel trocar roupa, e \u00e9 aqui que Dreambox se encontra.<\/span><\/p>","pa_condition_repeater":[{"_id":"089e335","pa_condition_date":"2022\/08\/20","pa_condition_date_range":"2022\/08\/20"}],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"f333923","elType":"widget","settings":{"youtube_url":"https:\/\/youtu.be\/OQMw_LAYRII","vimeo_url":"https:\/\/vimeo.com\/235215203","dailymotion_url":"https:\/\/www.dailymotion.com\/video\/x6tqhqb","pa_condition_repeater":[],"videopress_url":"https:\/\/videopress.com\/v\/ZCAOzTNk","premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"video"}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":true},{"id":"a681004","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

Depois de alguns ensaios com as luzes decidiu-se que tinhamos bom material para trabalhar.<\/span><\/p>","pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"e84f839","elType":"widget","settings":{"premium_gallery_load_more_text":"Load More","premium_gallery_filter":"","premium_gallery_first_cat_switcher":"","premium_gallery_first_cat_label":"All","premium_gallery_cats_content":[{"premium_gallery_img_cat":"Category 1","_id":"7582b5f"},{"premium_gallery_img_cat":"Category 2","_id":"2edbf36"}],"url_flag":"cat","premium_gallery_img_content":[{"premium_gallery_img_category":"Category 1","_id":"1761649","premium_gallery_img":{"url":"https:\/\/guilhermemartins.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2023\/04\/boxes.jpg","id":3489,"size":"","alt":"","source":"library"}},{"premium_gallery_img_category":"Category 2","_id":"1590ea5","premium_gallery_img":{"url":"https:\/\/guilhermemartins.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2023\/04\/test1.jpg","id":3483,"size":"","alt":"","source":"library"}}],"pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"premium-img-gallery"},{"id":"f80a9fb","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

Para cada luz estou a usar um Mosfet<\/a>, estes t\u00eam um Led na placa o que permitiu simular todo o comportamento das luzes no laborat\u00f3rio.<\/p>","pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":true},{"id":"0f80a68","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

Como queria que as luzes tivessem v\u00e1rios comportamentos, decidi usar um sensor de movimento (PIR), e como redund\u00e2ncia acrescentei um sensor de Micro Ondas que detecta altera\u00e7\u00f5es nos campos electromagn\u00e9ticos. Com estas detec\u00e7\u00f5es os diferentes estados v\u00e3o-se alternando.<\/p>","pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"5ddb793","elType":"widget","settings":{"image":{"url":"https:\/\/guilhermemartins.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2023\/04\/sensor.jpg","id":3482,"size":"","alt":"","source":"library"},"image_size":"medium_large","pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"image"},{"id":"dac0063","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

Heartbeat:<\/p>

Todas pulsam em un\u00edssono, remetendo \u00e0s v\u00e1rias ideias\/sonhos\/mem\u00f3rias que nos pulsam em simult\u00e2neo ora por estamos em multi-tasking, ora por estarmos desfocados, ou por ter v\u00e1rias preocupa\u00e7\u00f5es, ou por sermos simplesmente multi-sonhadores.<\/p>","pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":true},{"id":"8e0dfff","elType":"section","settings":{"structure":"20","pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[{"id":"1bbb6db","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":50,"_inline_size":null,"pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[{"id":"447849a","elType":"widget","settings":{"video_type":"hosted","youtube_url":"https:\/\/www.youtube.com\/watch?v=XHOmBV4js_E","vimeo_url":"https:\/\/vimeo.com\/235215203","dailymotion_url":"https:\/\/www.dailymotion.com\/video\/x6tqhqb","hosted_url":{"url":"https:\/\/guilhermemartins.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2023\/04\/randomfades_h264.mp4","id":3520,"size":"","alt":"","source":"library"},"autoplay":"yes","play_on_mobile":"yes","loop":"yes","pa_condition_repeater":[],"videopress_url":"https:\/\/videopress.com\/v\/ZCAOzTNk","premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"video"}],"isInner":true},{"id":"fde31b4","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":50,"_inline_size":null,"pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[{"id":"691129a","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

Random Fade In\/Out:<\/p>

O mesmo do heartbeat mas ass\u00edncrono. Ideias\/sonhos\/mem\u00f3rias d\u00edspares, que competem por aten\u00e7\u00e3o. Mente desfocada ou actividade mental excessiva.<\/p>","pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":true},{"id":"e71a891","elType":"section","settings":{"structure":"20","pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[{"id":"ca2c7e5","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":50,"_inline_size":null,"pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[{"id":"aa5f050","elType":"widget","settings":{"video_type":"hosted","youtube_url":"https:\/\/www.youtube.com\/watch?v=XHOmBV4js_E","vimeo_url":"https:\/\/vimeo.com\/235215203","dailymotion_url":"https:\/\/www.dailymotion.com\/video\/x6tqhqb","hosted_url":{"url":"https:\/\/guilhermemartins.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2023\/04\/unique_h264.mp4","id":3521,"size":"","alt":"","source":"library"},"autoplay":"yes","play_on_mobile":"yes","loop":"yes","pa_condition_repeater":[],"videopress_url":"https:\/\/videopress.com\/v\/ZCAOzTNk","premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"video"}],"isInner":true},{"id":"fff7113","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":50,"_inline_size":null,"pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[{"id":"260514e","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

Actividade Individual<\/p>

Uma \u00fanica luz activa, como que se o nosso foco mental estivesse agudo, consci\u00eancia activa, mente preenchida com um \u00fanico pensamento. Mindfulness, Nirvana.<\/span><\/p>","pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":true},{"id":"3d27437","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

Esta foi a primeira instala\u00e7\u00e3o a solo, depois de mais de uma d\u00e9cada a desenvolver projectos comerciais para clientes.<\/span><\/p>

Deixo um especial agradecimento \u00e0 S\u00f3nia Sousa (@Lady.Maker<\/a>), pelo convite e desafio para participar no \u201cCanto Circular\u201d, e por ter acreditado e confiado em mim para a realiza\u00e7\u00e3o deste projecto. \u00c0 crew do Blab Colectivo Maker (@blablapt<\/a>) por toda a ajuda e disponibilidade. E ao Largo de Resid\u00eancias (@largoresidencias<\/a>) por suportar e incentivar estas iniciativas.<\/p>

\u00c9 tamb\u00e9m uma honra estar ao lado de \"masya,, \u00e9 uma instala\u00e7\u00e3o\" do @m41.m<\/a>, e ver como no fim estas duas obras co-existem e comunicam t\u00e3o bem entre elas.<\/p>","pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"1992c42","elType":"widget","settings":{"image":{"url":"https:\/\/guilhermemartins.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2023\/04\/masya.jpeg","id":3490,"size":"","alt":"","source":"library"},"image_size":"medium_large","pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"image"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]

item.title: Perfect Illusion
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Perfect Illusion

This musical piece explores the Buddhist idea of Maya - the illusion of objective reality that surrounds us. Immerse yourself in the sounds and rhythms of this musical voyage, that leads us to reflect on the impermanent and interdependent nature of all things, and to free ourselves from the illusion that imprisons us. Let yourself be carried away by the music and the beauty of life, and allow it to lead you to a deeper and more meaningful understanding of existence.

https://guilhermemartins.bandcamp.com/track/perfect-illusion

https://youtu.be/taaWTtSZ9cw

This musical piece explores the Buddhist idea of Maya - the illusion of objective reality that surrounds us. Immerse yourself in the sounds and rhythms of this musical voyage, that leads us to reflect on the impermanent and interdependent nature of all things, and to free ourselves from the illusion that imprisons us. Let yourself be carried away by the music and the beauty of life, and allow it to lead you to a deeper and more meaningful understanding of existence.<\/p>

item.title: Versailles
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Centenary of Versailles

Partnership with Marvilab, a highly talented and creative boutique in Marvila (Lisbon).

This project consisted in a set composed by kinetic sculptures, moving furniture and dynamic lights.
This moving set had to be activated on a timed based interval. 

This video shows some making off and the final result of this great project.

https://youtu.be/REDlUwWJv3U?si=pQo8eISu3XR2uc1Z

My work consisted in developing a set of microcontrollers to drive the motors and lights.
Then there was a Maestro microcontroller that switched on and off all the others microcontrollers. The Maestro had the capability of programming the time based interval, and also how long the activation persisted.

The following video shows my process of developing a set of homemade PCB's and the Maestro controller.
All microcontrollers are ESP32, and the Maestro is an M5Stack Core 2.

 

https://youtu.be/PzKR5d6QTnk

item.title: Glimmer
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Glimmer by Micro Audio Waves and Rui Horta

https://youtu.be/nqpmR6J8SII?si=rS0BQyqryLbYFgje

Glimmer is the new album by Micro Audio Waves, and just like in the past Zoetrope, they partnership with the coreographer Rui Horta to create an unique and immersive concert experience. Just like in Zoetrope, I was once again privileged in being inside this epic journey. 

My work consisted in creating visual digital contents, writing a custom software in Touchdesigner to agregate videos and interactive visual contents, LED strips control, and also to trigger syncronized events to Ableton Live and GrandMA Light Mixer.

For me this was a massive challenge, to be able to do everything from scratch on a tight timeline, easy to manage and update,, and also easy to operate live.

https://youtu.be/jImRSQqeMVI

In this video I'm showing a little bit of the Sync/Trigger Program made in Cycling 74 MAX. This one sends a trigger to Touchdesigner and simultaneously to Ableton Live.
If there is a precount bit in ableton Live it delays the trigger to TD. This way the videos are always in sync with the audio.

The link between Max and TouchDesigner is through OSC.
The link between Max and Ableton Live is via RTPMidi.

There are two computers running the same TouchDesigner program, in case of failure, the other computer takes control. There's an HDMI switch to commute from one output to the other.

There are also two computers running the same Ableton Live Session, syncronized with an iConnectivity interface. My Max program sends a Midi command to iConnectivity, and this command is sent to both Live instances, to TazLite plugin.

The following images show a little bit of my visual art for Glimmer.

Glimmer
Direção, desenho de luz e espaço cénico: Rui Horta
Coreografia: Rui Horta, Gaya de Medeiros
Música original: Micro Audio Waves (Claudia Efe, C. Morg, Flak e Francisco Rebelo)
Intérpretes: Claudia Efe, Gaya de Medeiros, C. Morg, Flak e Francisco Rebelo
Conteúdos digitais e desenvolvimento de software: Guilherme Martins
Realização vídeo: Stella Horta
Direção de fotografia: Tomás Vieira
Vídeo ‘Liquid Luck’ e consultoria LED: David Ventura
Video ‘Liquid Luck’ e design gráfico: Marco Madruga
Figurinos: Constança Entrudo
Figurinos do vídeo ‘Pacific Airways’: Sofia Braga
Direção de produção: Pedro Santos
Direção técnica: João Chicó
Som: Artur David
Roadie: Sérgio Barata
Assistente de iluminação e palco: Pedro Guimarães
Comunicação: this is ground control

I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"video"},{"id":"1647213","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

Glimmer<\/a> is the new album by Micro Audio Waves<\/a>, and just like in the past Zoetrope<\/a>, they partnership with the coreographer Rui Horta to create an unique and immersive concert experience. Just like in Zoetrope, I was once again privileged in being inside this epic journey.\u00a0<\/p>

My work consisted in creating visual digital contents, writing a custom software in\u00a0Touchdesigner<\/a>\u00a0to agregate videos and interactive visual contents, LED strips control, and also to trigger syncronized events to Ableton Live and GrandMA Light Mixer.<\/p>

For me this was a massive challenge, to be able to do everything from scratch on a tight timeline, easy to manage and update,, and also easy to operate live.<\/p>","pa_condition_repeater":[{"_id":"089e335","pa_condition_date":"2022\/08\/20","pa_condition_date_range":"2022\/08\/20"}],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"2e85535","elType":"widget","settings":{"youtube_url":"https:\/\/youtu.be\/jImRSQqeMVI","vimeo_url":"https:\/\/vimeo.com\/235215203","dailymotion_url":"https:\/\/www.dailymotion.com\/video\/x6tqhqb","pa_condition_repeater":[{"_id":"fbea8c2","pa_condition_date":"2022\/08\/20","pa_condition_date_range":"2022\/08\/20"}],"videopress_url":"https:\/\/videopress.com\/v\/ZCAOzTNk","premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"video"},{"id":"53b1f53","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

In this video I'm showing a little bit of the Sync\/Trigger Program made in\u00a0Cycling 74 MAX<\/a>. This one sends a trigger to Touchdesigner and simultaneously to Ableton Live<\/a>.
If there is a precount bit in ableton Live it delays the trigger to TD. This way the videos are always in sync with the audio.<\/p>

The link between Max and TouchDesigner is through OSC.
The link between Max and Ableton Live is via RTPMidi.<\/span><\/p>

There are two computers running the same TouchDesigner program, in case of failure, the other computer takes control. There's an HDMI switch to commute from one output to the other.<\/span><\/p>

There are also two computers running the same Ableton Live Session, syncronized with an iConnectivity<\/a> interface. My Max program sends a Midi command to iConnectivity, and this command is sent to both Live instances, to TazLite<\/a> plugin.

The following images show a little bit of my visual art for Glimmer.<\/p>","pa_condition_repeater":[{"_id":"089e335","pa_condition_date":"2022\/08\/20","pa_condition_date_range":"2022\/08\/20"}],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":true},{"id":"1bdb3de","elType":"widget","settings":{"image":{"url":"https:\/\/guilhermemartins.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2024\/02\/Glimmer-scaled.jpg","id":3660,"size":"","alt":"","source":"library"},"image_size":"full","pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"image"},{"id":"bbd5aa2","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

Glimmer<\/b>
Dire\u00e7\u00e3o, desenho de luz e espa\u00e7o c\u00e9nico: Rui Horta
Coreografia: Rui Horta, Gaya de Medeiros
M\u00fasica original: Micro Audio Waves (Claudia Efe, C. Morg, Flak e Francisco Rebelo)
Int\u00e9rpretes: Claudia Efe, Gaya de Medeiros, C. Morg, Flak e Francisco Rebelo
Conte\u00fados digitais e desenvolvimento de software: Guilherme Martins
Realiza\u00e7\u00e3o v\u00eddeo: Stella Horta
Dire\u00e7\u00e3o de fotografia: Tom\u00e1s Vieira
V\u00eddeo \u2018Liquid Luck\u2019 e consultoria LED: David Ventura
Video \u2018Liquid Luck\u2019 e design gr\u00e1fico: Marco Madruga
Figurinos: Constan\u00e7a Entrudo
Figurinos do v\u00eddeo \u2018Pacific Airways\u2019: Sofia Braga
Dire\u00e7\u00e3o de produ\u00e7\u00e3o: Pedro Santos
Dire\u00e7\u00e3o t\u00e9cnica: Jo\u00e3o Chic\u00f3
Som: Artur David
Roadie: S\u00e9rgio Barata
Assistente de ilumina\u00e7\u00e3o e palco: Pedro Guimar\u00e3es
Comunica\u00e7\u00e3o: this is ground control<\/p>","pa_condition_repeater":[{"_id":"089e335","pa_condition_date":"2022\/08\/20","pa_condition_date_range":"2022\/08\/20"}],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]

item.title: Life's Journey
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Life's Journey

It's not about the destination
Be grateful for every step, embrace your challenges, and celebrate victories.

Slow down, and appreciate small things.
Let your heart and intuition guide you in the right directions.
Embrace every moment with courage, live authentically, and appreciate the journey itself.
Connect with Mother Nature. Immerse yourself in the Universe.

Music performed live on a SynthStrom Deluge.
Video recorded with a Gopro Hero 9, edited in Davinci Resolve.

https://youtu.be/QT1saNJqF_E?si=HfNxMYmDNo3caJrb

Embrace every moment with courage, live authentically, and appreciate the journey itself.
Connect with Mother Nature. Immerse yourself in the Universe.

Music performed live on a SynthStrom Deluge.
Video recorded with a Gopro Hero 9, edited in Davinci Resolve.<\/p>","pa_condition_repeater":[{"_id":"089e335","pa_condition_date":"2022\/08\/20","pa_condition_date_range":"2022\/08\/20"}],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"2e85535","elType":"widget","settings":{"youtube_url":"https:\/\/youtu.be\/QT1saNJqF_E?si=HfNxMYmDNo3caJrb","vimeo_url":"https:\/\/vimeo.com\/235215203","dailymotion_url":"https:\/\/www.dailymotion.com\/video\/x6tqhqb","pa_condition_repeater":[{"_id":"fbea8c2","pa_condition_date":"2022\/08\/20","pa_condition_date_range":"2022\/08\/20"}],"videopress_url":"https:\/\/videopress.com\/v\/ZCAOzTNk","premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"video"}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]

item.title: Sonic Flow
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Sonic Flow

Exploração paisagística sonora imersiva, mergulhando profundamente na quietude meditativa e no fluxo sónico.

Immersive sonic landscape exploration, diving deep into meditative stillness and sonic flow.

#AmbientMusic #ModularSynth #MeditationMusic #Soundscape #Relaxation #GenerativeMusic

https://youtu.be/rioACZCmySI?si=M4MLiubn_d2Iwn5H

item.title: Treino S.E.R.E.
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Treino S.E.R.E.

Incrível experiência produzir, filmar e editar os teasers para o evento S.E.R.E. (Sobrevivência, Evacuação, Resistência, Escape), organizado pelo grupo P&A Preparação & Autossuficiência. Este evento conta com os conhecimentos especializados do instrutor de técnicas de sobrevivência, Pedrosa Sinistro, que partilha técnicas valiosas para enfrentar situações extremas com segurança e confiança.

https://preparacaoeautossuficiencia.pt/
https://www.instagram.com/pedrosa.sinistro/

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ptApLEKymk4https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2F__GnmRpqQ

Incr\u00edvel experi\u00eancia produzir, filmar e editar os teasers para o evento S.E.R.E. (Sobreviv\u00eancia, Evacua\u00e7\u00e3o, Resist\u00eancia, Escape), organizado pelo grupo P&A Prepara\u00e7\u00e3o & Autossufici\u00eancia. Este evento conta com os conhecimentos especializados do instrutor de t\u00e9cnicas de sobreviv\u00eancia, Pedrosa Sinistro, que partilha t\u00e9cnicas valiosas para enfrentar situa\u00e7\u00f5es extremas com seguran\u00e7a e confian\u00e7a.<\/p>\n

item.title: bio <> land <> escape
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
bio <> land <> escape

Bio >< Land >< Escape

Nasce de sessões livres de experiências com bio materiais, exploração cinética, sistemas de captura de imagem e som improvisado.
É uma coleção de fragmentos de matéria, vista de perto, como uma nave ou um submarino que sobrevoa um território desconhecido.

Sem objectivos finais ou narrativas, a técnica nasce da sucessão de tentativas, erros e ajustes no momento.

Apesar de o objeto final ser exposto em “grande plano”, não existem grandes planos, nem certezas sobre o que é esta peça, ou o que poderá vir a ser.

Agradecimentos: Artecódigo, Biolab Lisboa

https://youtu.be/iFDXfqqlQmY

item.title: O Fogo é um Negócio de Milhões
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
O Fogo é um Negócio de Milhões

Uma homenagem a quem enfrenta as chamas, a quem perde tudo, e a todos os seres vivos que já não voltam mais.

O meu primeiro vídeo feito com AI nasceu da ideia de refletir sobre os fogos que se repetem todos os anos. Desenvolvi um storyboard e criei imagens para cada momento.
As cenas com pessoas a falar foram feitas com o Flow. Todos os outros vídeos foram criados com o Freepik.

Incrível ter concluído este vídeo conceptual em menos de um dia.

https://youtu.be/WlMNo4xp-gk?si=j8Ra_XW9h6v86cWo

item.title: Shadows of Time
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Shadows of Time

Desta vez quis explorar uma pseudo experiência que sempre achei fascinante. É uma reflexão que nos mostra como aceitamos e perpetuamos hábitos e tradições sem saber ou entender as suas origens.

É claro que nunca teria conseguido fazer este vídeo num espaço de tempo tão curto e com um orçamento tão baixo, se não fossem as novas ferramentas de geração de conteúdos da moda: ChatGPT, Freepik e Flow.

https://youtu.be/pVvD_jaSs7g

item.title: Ensaio da Humanidade
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Ensaio da Humanidade

Tentativa de criar um ecossistema artificial que explora dinâmicas próprias da humanidade. Este ecosistema é composto por agentes autónomos com características próprias dos humanos: comportamentos, ideologia, fome, felicidade, poder, recursos e território. A simulação evolui sozinha com base no produto das interações entre os agentes.

Será que estamos condiccionados à divisão, manipulação, competição e conflito? O meu algorítmo diz que sim, mas se calhar é só um erro do meu algorítmo.

https://guilhermemartins.net/p5js/humanitysimulator1/

--

Humanity Rehearsal

An attempt to create an artificial ecosystem that explores dynamics inherent to human nature.
This ecosystem is composed of autonomous agents that mirror human traits: behaviour, ideology, hunger, happiness, power, resources, and territory.
The simulation evolves on its own, driven solely by the interactions between these agents.

Are we conditioned for division, manipulation, competition, and conflict?
My algorithm suggests yes, although it might be just a mistake of my algorithm.

https://guilhermemartins.net/p5js/humanitysimulator1/

https://youtu.be/ypCYeP2TluM

item.title: Daily Timer
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Timer App

Durante as sessões de desenvolvimento é comum perder a noção do tempo.

Desenvolvi esta app minimalista para ter um cronómetro sempre vísivel no ecrã, que quando chega ao fim toca um alarme.

Funcionalidades:
1º Timer
2º Timer (só corre se o valor for > 0)
Volume do alarme
Repetição
Janela sempre visível 

Source code:
https://github.com/guibot/Daily_Timer
App para Mac:
https://github.com/guibot/Daily_Timer/releases/
